description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
variable referring to whether the experimenters used an opaque or a see through barrier during the test
the facility participants are from – mpi(WKPRC)/ks (Kumamoto Sanctuary)/pri (Primate Research Institute)
viewing time to the correct side during the anticipatory looking window -miliseconds
viewing time to the incorrect side during the anticipatory looking window -miliseconds
differential looking score (total viewing times to target minus total viewing times to distractor, divided by the sum of these values)
whether the participant look first to the correct target (correctly anticipating the looks of the agent)
whether the participant look first to the incorrect target (incorrectly anticipating the looks of the agent)
